name: The One Truth
description:
Welcome to the game that you will want to play for eternity!  The controls are simple, use the left and right arrow keys to move and spam the Space bar to jump and fly!  You only have One life, if you lose, you restart! Make it through all of the levels and face the final boss!  Defeat him and you finally gain access to the One room that he has been guarding for centuries and guarding its One Truth that lies within! 

DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES MORTAL?
